messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Self-employed
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Nance, My dh has dreams of teaching my dd how to do currency trading early on in her teens so that she can be self sufficient as soon as it strikes her. WE
messages.messageBody:
Hi Nance,



My dh has dreams of teaching my dd how to do currency trading early on in
her teens so that she can be self sufficient as soon as it strikes her. WE
will see how that goes. She might surprise and horrify my dh and want to be
a doctor!



LOL.

Sherri-Lee



_____

From: marbleface@... [mailto:marbleface@...]
Sent: Friday, June 25, 2004 4:28 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Self-employed



We're in the "self-employed" boat too and I think it's good for the kids to
see all that goes into it. Maybe they'll be less intimidated about striking
out
on their own in some venture if they've seen how things work. And don't
work.
:)

Nance

In a message dated 6/25/2004 4:37:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
will teach them what they need to do a variety of jobs available out
there...
then I remember that we are self employed people and hopefully she will be
self employed and it won't all matter... so I guess it is the eternal
internal
battle I have going on about almost anything:)

Thanks for the reply... good reminder,

Sherri-Lee
